entry.title: Replacement Battery Compatible for Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra EB-BN985ABY
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 19.99

You have a Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra shuts down unexpectedly?

Does your cell phone only work when the battery is plugged in?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra replacement battery.

The old battery in your cell phone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

The OEM Batteries for Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra are brand-new batteries coming directly from our manufacturer. They are custom-built for customers who demand the same quality as original Samsung batteries. 

  • Zero cycle count
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • No wrapping for a better fit
  • High output current capacity
  • 1 Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with a Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra.

Warranty

The Replacement Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra Battery comes with a 1-year warranty, as the other Samsung Battery Replacement Parts.

Part Type Battery
Compatible Model Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra EB-BN985ABY
Battery Type 4500mAh
Device Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty
